ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Simocephalus serrulatus (daphnids) first instar 4.9 (95% confidence interval 4.0-6.7) mg/l/96 hr at 15 °C /pH not specified; static bioassay/

2,4-D PROPYLENE GLYCOL BUTYL ETHER ESTER HAD A 96 HR MEDIAN LETHAL CONCN VALUE IN SALMO CLARKI (CUTTHROAT TROUT) & SALVELINUS NAMAYCUSH (LAKE TROUT) OF 490-1220 UG/L IN STATIC TESTS. /PH NOT SPECIFIED/
